kernfrasen: deserving of no special treatment before God
not weighing our merits, but pardoning our offenses
weight that for all he knew might truly crush him
weight of our sin... was assumed by him
Father and the Son acting together

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: preparing to shoulder a weight that for all he knew might truly crush him forever

cognitieve_implicaties: Sin is not just an idea but a tangible, destructive pressure.
theologische_implicaties: Christ's strength is the only thing preventing the hearer from being crushed.
ethische_implicaties: Relief and gratitude for the removal of the burden.
onbedoelde_consequenties: May imply God is the source of the crushing gravity (wrath).

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'burden of sin' cliche by adding the visceral, existential threat of being 'crushed forever'.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon successfully bridges the Juridical (condemnation) and Relational (abandonment) domains by defining 'Godforsakenness' as the ultimate legal penalty.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The shift from legal status to physical mass is abrupt.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: A judge pardons a debt; a laborer carries a weight. The sermon mixes the 'pardon' of offenses with the 'bearing' of weight.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher defines the 'penalty' of the law specifically as the 'loss of love' from the Father.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Cup' metaphor by linking it to the 'dread of Godforsakenness' rather than just physical death.
sterktes.voorbeeld: remove this cup from me... the dread of the Godforsakenness of sin.

risicos.beschrijving: The description of Jesus 'not knowing' if the weight would crush him might lead to a denial of his omniscience/divinity.
risicos.voorbeeld: for all he knew might truly crush him forever
risicos.potentiele_impact: Confusion regarding Christology (the nature of Christ).

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The Garden of Gethsemane as a site of cosmic struggle.
sub_worlds: The modern world of corporate executives and gun owners

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; connects ancient narrative to modern psychology.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Reinforces the idea of Jesus as the 'representative man' taking our place.

verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Father and Son acting with 'one will' in love.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Perfectly aligns with the Palm Sunday transition from 'Hosanna' to 'Crucify'.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by Juridical and Relational domains, effectively using the metaphor of 'Abandonment' to bridge the two. It avoids the 'Economic' domain (debt/ransom) in favor of a more psychological and physical 'Weight' metaphor.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Describe the contents of the cup as the 'bitterness' or 'poison' of specific human sins mentioned earlier.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The cup filled with the sharp tongues and shredded files of our own making.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Use the metaphor of 'Evidence'—the weight of the evidence in a trial becoming the weight that crushes the defendant.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: If sin is a weight Jesus carries, it implies sin is an external object rather than an internal corruption.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'Sickness' domain to show sin's internal effect.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To show the 'solidarity' mentioned, the church as a building where Christ is the cornerstone holding up the 'weight' of the stones.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to explain the internal psychological state of Christ to a modern audience.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'Weight' rather than the poetic beauty of the 'Dereliction' phrasing.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Focuses on the conceptual structure of the 'Abba' relationship rather than the preacher's personality.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher uses 'Fear of Abandonment' as a source domain to explain the abstract concept of 'Hell/Godforsakenness'.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'CONTAINER' schema regarding 'entering into' the Passion.
